sentences.en: A stab of misgiving shot through Val.
sentences.cn: 一阵惶惑象匕首一样戳了法尔一下.

sentences.en: Carrie observed his ease with some misgiving.
sentences.cn: 看到他这样悠闲自得,嘉莉不免有些疑惑.

sentences.en: He had adopted the profession by accident and practised it with misgiving.
sentences.cn: 他干上这一行纯属偶然,心中一直惴惴不安.

sentences.en: He looked with misgiving at the overcast sky.
sentences.cn: 他不安地看着阴云密布的天空.

sentences.en: He looked with misgiving at the strange man in front of him.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑地望着眼前这奇怪的人.

sentences.en: He looks with misgiving at the strange man in front of him.
sentences.cn: 他用疑虑的眼光看看他碟子上奇怪的食物.

sentences.en: I can resign my immortal part to him without misgiving.
sentences.cn: 我可以毫无恐惧地把我不朽的部分交给他.

sentences.en: I read the letter with a sense of misgiving.
sentences.cn: 我看了那封信,感到有些怀疑.

sentences.en: In all of Carrie's actions there was a touch of misgiving.
sentences.cn: " 嘉莉在买这买那的时候,心里总有些惴惴不安.

sentences.en: In short, is it not a concession to the misgiving, to keep the forge?'
sentences.cn: 简而言之, 保留那小熔炉是否是对那种顾虑的让步 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: My mother looked round with an expression of misgiving.
sentences.cn: 我母亲向四周张望着,显得很是不安.

sentences.en: Opponents of nuclear energy have deep misgivings about its safety.
sentences.cn: 反核能人士非常担心核能的安全性。

sentences.en: She eyed the distant shoreline with misgiving.
sentences.cn: 她担忧地望着远方的海岸线。

sentences.en: The first words of the text filled us with misgiving.
sentences.cn: 正文开头的文字让我们颇为担心。

sentences.en: There was misgiving in his own voice also.
sentences.cn: 在他自己的口气里,也含有疑虑不定的意思.

sentences.en: They are great simply because they receive life without misgiving.
sentences.cn: 他们之所以伟大,仅仅是因为珍惜生活.

sentences.en: Thus the first hour of misgiving was swept away.
sentences.cn: 就这样,嘉莉最初的疑虑被一扫而光.

words.tran_cn: 担忧；使…疑虑；害怕（misgive的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 疑虑， 担心， 恐惧，不安
trans.tran_en: a feeling of doubt or fear about what might happen or about whether something is right

trans.tran_cn: 使（某人的情绪、精神等）疑虑，担忧，害怕( misgive的现在分词 )
